comments.text:
Created attachment 507967
Add a note about preferring services.h over do_GetService

I had trouble remembering about mozilla::services::... so add a note to do_GetService()
comments.raw_text: I had trouble remembering about mozilla::services::... so add a note to do_GetService()

comments.creator: benjamin@smedbergs.us
comments.author: benjamin@smedbergs.us
comments.raw_text: This comment is not specific enough. mozilla::services is only available from within libxul, and this header is used by extensions.
comments.text:
Comment on attachment 507967
Add a note about preferring services.h over do_GetService

This comment is not specific enough. mozilla::services is only available from within libxul, and this header is used by extensions.
